title: Newton's Method Calculator – Step-by-Step Newton–Raphson Solver

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Newton iteration formula \[ x_{n+1} = x_n - \frac{f(x_n)}{f'(x_n)} \] At each step we approximate \( f \) by its tangent line at \( x_n \) and take the intersection of that tangent with the x-axis as the next iterate \( x_{n+1} \).
